constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 219 (Monday, December 20, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. LESKO:
H.R. 6333.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H7838]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds to establish, maintain, or support any national database identifying individuals as having received or not received any vaccine.
